title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Job DESTROYS Luke (JK: they're friends!)
description:
In this installment, Job asks Luke hard-hitting questions related to his conversation with Julian like,
"What are you concerned about?"
"What are you doing here?"
and
"What is your view of existence itself?"

Talk to PVK Randos and their ilk here: 
https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg
